Component.description: Category of metadata (e.g. Tools, Publications, etc.); provide the same one for all items/rows.
Component.title: Component

Filename.description: The path of a file in Synapse, relative to the project. The file associated with the path will be annotated with attributes contained in this sheet.
Filename.title: Filename

ImageNumberofObjects.description: The number of objects (eg cells) described
ImageNumberofObjects.title: Image Number of Objects

ImageObjectClass.description: Defines the structure that the mask delineates
ImageObjectClass.title: Image Object Class

ImageObjectClassDescription.description: If Imaging Object Class is "Other", please use this field to provide a text description of the imaging object class associated with the segmentation data
ImageObjectClassDescription.title: Image Object Class Description

ImageParameterfile.description: Path in Synapse to a text file listing algorithm version numbers and relevant parameters needed to reproduce the analysis
ImageParameterfile.title: Image Parameter file

ImageSegmentationDataType.description: Specifies how the segmentation is stored
ImageSegmentationDataType.title: Image Segmentation Data Type

ImagingLevel2Key.description: Unique ImagingLevel2_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same Dataset. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separate list.
ImagingLevel2Key.title: ImagingLevel2 Key

ImagingLevel3ImageKey.description: Unique ImagingLevel3Image_id foreign key(s) that link metadata entries as part of the same Dataset. Please provide multiple values as a comma-separate list.
ImagingLevel3ImageKey.title: ImagingLevel3Image Key

ImagingLevel3SegmentsId.description: A unique identifier used by schematic for record updates and as a reference key in other schemas.
ImagingLevel3SegmentsId.title: ImagingLevel3Segments_id

SoftwareandVersion.description: Name of software used to generate the information contained in the file. String
SoftwareandVersion.title: Software and Version
